Joan Ruth Bader Ginsburg (/ˈbeɪdər ˈɡɪnzbɜːrɡ/ BAY-dər GHINZ-burg; née Bader; March 15, 1933 – September 18, 2020) was an American lawyer and jurist who served as an associate justice of the Supreme Court of the United States from 1993 until her death in 2020.
Is Ruth Bader Ginsburg currently a judge on the US Supreme Court? Ruth Bader Ginsburg US Supreme Court judge

detail.reasoning: The given text states that Ruth Bader Ginsburg is a current justice of the Supreme Court of the United States. However, the evidences provided indicate that Ruth Bader Ginsburg served as an associate justice of the Supreme Court from 1993 until her death on September 18, 2020. Therefore, she is no longer serving as a justice, as she passed away in 2020.
